data_table.description: Ultrasound Imputed Values, White Males, Exam 3. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: LOPCDA45
variable.description: Derived average far wall thickness, left common carotid: optimal angle [Ultrasound Imputed Values, white males, exam 3]

variable.name: ROPCDA45
variable.description: Derived average far wall thickness, right common carotid: optimal angle [Ultrasound Imputed Values, white males, exam 3]

variable.name: LBICDA45
variable.description: Derived average far wall thickness, left bifurcation [Ultrasound Imputed Values, white males, exam 3]

variable.name: RBICDA45
variable.description: Derived average far wall thickness, right bifurcation [Ultrasound Imputed Values, white males, exam 3]

variable.name: LINCDA45
variable.description: Derived average far wall thickness, left internal carotid [Ultrasound Imputed Values, white males, exam 3]

variable.name: RINCDA45
variable.description: Derived average far wall thickness, right internal carotid [Ultrasound Imputed Values, white males, exam 3]

variable.name: RESPONS3
variable.description: Number of observed sites [Ultrasound Imputed Values, white males, exam 3]

variable.name: SUM3WT45
variable.description: Number of observed values / 6 = weight for Sum45_21, 2, or 3 [Ultrasound Imputed Values, white males, exam 3]

variable.name: LOPCWA45
variable.description: Weight for LOPCWA45 [Ultrasound Imputed Values, white males, exam 3]

variable.name: ROPCWA45
variable.description: Weight for ROPCWA45 [Ultrasound Imputed Values, white males, exam 3]

variable.name: LBICWA45
variable.description: Weight for LBICWA45 [Ultrasound Imputed Values, white males, exam 3]

variable.name: RBICWA45
variable.description: Weight for RBICWA45 [Ultrasound Imputed Values, white males, exam 3]

variable.name: LINCWA45
variable.description: Weight for LINCWA45 [Ultrasound Imputed Values, white males, exam 3]

variable.name: RINCWA45
variable.description: Weight for RINCWA45 [Ultrasound Imputed Values, white males, exam 3]

variable.name: SUM45_31
variable.description: Mean of the DA45 variables [Ultrasound Imputed Values, white males, exam 3]

variable.name: SUM45_32
variable.description: Weighted mean of the DA45 variables [Ultrasound Imputed Values, white males, exam 3]

variable.name: SUM45_33
variable.description: Z-score summary statistic for the DA45 variables [Ultrasound Imputed Values, white males, exam 3]
